title: Noushou Sakuretsu Girl
sinopse:
'Welcome, to the Human Zoo' When an ordinary high school student Ichii Hana woke up, she was in a cage with her classmates. And there she was entered into a death game involving use of her mobile phone!!

Along with a classmate with the same name, yet complete opposite in personality, Inusawa Hana, she challenges the game!?

'I'll definitely stay alive. By throwing away this stale body'

(Source: Amazon)
